Catalyst · Workshop

Crafting Type Singapore 2020

Workshop on type design in Singapore as part of the Crafting Type workshop series.

Year 2020
Context Community
Status Completed

Delivered a type design workshop in Singapore as part of the international Crafting Type workshop series. The Crafting Type programme introduces participants to the fundamentals of typeface design through intensive hands-on workshops.

Tags: workshop typeface-design singapore crafting-type teaching hands-on
